mapper.select: select t.user_account as userAccount, t.school_account as schoolAccount, t.am as am, t.pm as pm, t.ev as ev, t.subj as subj, t.place_id as placeId, t.order_date as orderDate from schedule_t t where t.user_account=#{0} order by t.order_date
